text: Hello, great question Hafiz. You can learn more about CMS development with <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers|HubSpot CMS for Developers> and <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers-best-practices|HubSpot CMS for Developers II: Best Practices>, though they don't go into detail on customizable modules.
